emuInput.TitMainTitle: Bishop Robert B. Appleyard, Rev. Henry B. William, and Bishop William S. Thomas, posed on altar in Trinity Episcopal Cathedral
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 18, 1970, reads: "Ordained To Priesthood - The Rev. Henry B. Williams, center, was ordained to the sacred order of the Priesthood in Episcopal Church recently, during rites held at Trinity Cathedral. High churchmen who participated in the ceremony, pictured left to right are: Canon Junius F. Carter, rector of the Church of the Holy Cross, the candidate's parish; Rev. Charles P. Martin, rector of All Saints Church, Bishop Robert B. Appleyard, presiding prelate of the Pittsburgh Diocese; Rev. Williams, Bishop Wm. S. Thomas, Suffragan Bishop, Pittsburgh Diocese; Rev. Canon Olive R. Floyd, Church of the Advent, Brookline and Fr. W.P.H. Parker, formerly of Pittsburgh, now rector of St. Phillips Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, guest preacher for the occasion."
